S.FORM: == mwani qalang ro cyan te inu 部落概況與位置 == qalang Qba qani hiya ga, mnaki cqa qalang Talah , maki meohong na kkian smi abura na Rongpya,cka na qongu rgyax, binah nya ga rrgyax qabax, betunux calay kkian cani, ski heci akya qutux tmucing muyit toruy. cnlalu qalang Qba qani hiya ga, skahul ke na bnheci cyunga, musa naha bawiq rgyax mra ro iyik glabang qongu ga rinkyasan nya ga pisan hayi qba, mica qa si naha cnllwan maha qalang Qba. Qba qalang Qba. pinyugan qalang 部落遷徙 pinhqnyan na qalang Qba hiya ga, si ta mbzinas piyux kbhul ckawas, ryax nasa ga baha hmcwa smoya kangi xqayus na kkian ro blaq na rroq qa bnheci, knahul naha theyaq mwah ski kkian mwani, ro maki rryaniq qa pinhqnyan qani ga, muluw piyux kihung na yaw qa qalang, ro mica qa nyan mwah cani tnqalang. ryax na klhangan Ipun ga, skahul naha Tkasan ro Tgliq mwah cqani, cquliq Tkasan mwah lro, cipak na cquliq musa loyi hbun Slaq, binah kruma cquliq musa Sqbuh. ro ringan maki Tgliq na cquliq ga musa Kbanun, sta mwah Thelu lga, mica qa musa loyi Sqbuh. 日本時期,自 Tkasan 及 Tgliq 遷入.原 Tkasan hbun Slaq ,其後部分再遷回長嶺.原 Tgliq Sqbwh 地區. tayal qa nyan qalang Qba mwani 人口概況 pisa cquliq: mwani ga qalang Qba qani hiya ga, akya mpusal cquliq nya, magan calay cinmuyax Tayal nyan maki caca, kruma ga bnheci piyux kawas na yutas yaki, cyan maki kya qalang. mirok: qalang Sqbuh hiya ga cquliq Tayal, qabax cquliq nya ga glgan naha gaga ro kintayux na Tayal. minanaq na cquliq: qalang qba qani hiya ga, maki bnheci baq kbly tminun na qeqaya cyunga, naha ga pklahang gaga ro qmuyi gaga. 族群: . qalang Qba hiya ga snhyan naha utux Tayal, ro maki gaga cmyus uyi. snhe naha maha baq maray mblaq na qnxan ro kmloh, mwani ga maki cikay cquliq musa Tensinkyo ini ga Kiristo kyokay, maki uyi cquliq snhe utux Kahat. . qqyanux 經濟與特產 cpiyang yaw tnpila: qalang Qba hiya cpyanga mrwa kblay qeqaya ini ga mqupah, maki uyi cquliq nyan mawah bbesan, ro pinqumah hiya ga ana ocya,pagay, ro bway qhoniq, kblay na qeqaya hiya ga, ana patas qhoniq, tminun na ruma, binah lga wal heci mtiyaw ini ga mqwas la. ,讀書. pinklay: pinklay na qalang ana ocya, minnanaq na tminun ro kblay qeqaya na qhoniq, qabax qeqaya qani ga piyux cquliq baqun, llwax na qqyanux tnpila na qalang. 特產: . rryaniq 部落交通 qalang Qba hiya ga siglux ryaniq khangi ini ga muyut haya, blaq qa ryaniq cka qalang, musa tanux ga si glgan basu ini ga haya naha nanaq. musa su qalang Qba ga, garing su rryaniq 台七甲skura Slamaw, ro si shoyu musa ski qalang Talah, ini kbsaq lga, trang ptayux su syan abura na Talah uraw lga, skura glax ro tehok su kya qalang Qba uyi la. . wahan mangay mcisan 部落觀光 qalang Qba hiya ga maki piyux than ckaw na wahan cisan ana blaq ktalan na kintalan rgyax ro qalang Tayal. qalang hiya ga pincrux kya qutux ki'an na mkrax qa piyu'an, maki piyux cquliq mwah cisan cani. . gaga qalang 部落文化 qalang qba hiya ga piyux calay gaga naha, ana ke cyunga, pintasan, ro ryax snqasan, klokah klahang ro qmuyi gaga Tayal qa naha, ro syan naha inlungan qa qabax yaw cyunga, blaq calay kinnxan naha. . cipak kinbaqan na gaga 文化小知識 以下為 Labi Wilang 接受訪問內容: cyunga qnxan myan ga moyay cami ay, uka niqun myan cyunga, maniq cami ngahi, maniq cami ngahi lga,hlaqi lga uka ngahi la, mami trakis nanaq niqun myan la, ro ana cimu ga uka uyi, ro ana qucyu uyi ga ini cami pqucyu cyunga ay, ini kkucyu kakay myan, ini cami plukus uyi, maki lukus ga qabax maki mgaliq nanaq ga, ro nanu qaca, maki cami gako ga sesiy myan Ipun, payat cami kawas mnqwas ga, "oy aray lukus, ta nyan mgaliq lukus su ma", uka yaya mu, uka yaba mu, klhangan na yaki mu wayal mnukil yaki mu la son mu, ro sesiy myan Ipun payat nenci ga, ngilis ay! siqan su ma… ro biqan cu nya cikay i qutux mongpe ga, 'plukus qani ki'' uya son mu, huway su sesiy son mu, ro payat kawas lga, wayal Ipun la, payat ckawas lga, wayal i Ipun lga ro nyan mwah Cyukok qani la, ro mwah Cyukok q ani lga, bing cami karuh lga, nyan garing mquci Ipun nyan si kmwa ktiyil laro, 四年級lga wayal Ipun la, ro Cyukok mwah mlahang cami la maha cani, (piyux seto su cyunga ku?) 很多啊, seto cyunga ga khmay ay, us ga Ipun ya ga lokah tmucing ga seto naha, (sesiy baq tucing seto?) ini ini tucing sesiy haw, blaq calay sensey na Ipun ay xmalu, (ro nanu cyan naha pquyu?) Cyunga ga Ipun uyi ga lokah unro lokah ktlyum ga, 還有打棒球 tmucing boru, uka qani ya, 打棒球ro 摔角ca ciriq, ro unrokay maha kya Ipun cyunga ya, qaca ga 很重要, (piyux cquliq musa sanka unrokay ku? ) piyux ay! Tayal ga mwah Ipun cyunga ga ini kpiyux ga, mwah mlahang nanaq mwah ga, nanu irwa lga alan cami nya pnunro la alan nya pnciriq lro, rayun nya pnciriq qabax seto uyi ga, ro alan nya pcpngan mqwas uyi, ro rayun nya i nanu ca la, musa kmayal i pcpngan kkayal ke maki Girang uyi ga, (heci ga?) heci ga mayal ke na Ipun, ini kayal ke ni Tayal ya, kmayal su ke na Tayal lga, maki qutux tasuki, kmayal su cikay ke Tayal lga, si su nya wahi matu qaca la si su sbabuy laro, mica qa ini cami qbaq ke ni Ipun cyunga ro, (ziray Ipun ku?) uya ga cyunga ga, nanu ana cami gbyan mwah muyax masoq cami maniq ga. ini cami k'cyang ay, nayn mwah k'npung cqa na muyax ro mehong muyax, (ima mwah?) laqi ga laqi seto, kmayal su ke na Tayal lga, si su nya biqi qaca la, ro kmayal sesiy ma "ta su kmayal ke na Tayal, ta su ini kayal ke ni Ipun" ini cami qbaq kmayal ciyan ke ni Ipun ro, ro tuway mqbaq lga, ro wayal Ipun la, ro Cyukok nyan mlahang laro, ini cami qbaq mung ke ni Cyukok cyunga uyi ay, (son cimu nanu baq kmayal la mehong?) bsyaq bsyaq bsyaq lga, maha cani bsyaq lga, baq mung uyi laro, (han ima psbaq cimu?) uka psbaq nyan cami mung ke na sesiy uyi ro sesiy kamyal laro, nanu baq baq baq mung lga, nyan cami kmayal ke na Cyonghuaminkok qani lga, maha cani ro.(Cyukok ro Ipun ga qenu blaq?) aya baqaw ta qaca ya ya,(cyunga ga?) cyunga uyi ga ini say maha i Ipun ga mqutiy, blaq qa hnlangan Ipun uyi ay, uka mquriq nya ga Ipun, blaq calay (blaq calay qnxan qabax) uka quriq nya, (uka ciriq uyi ku?) uka! ini kmut culiq. kya nanaq Cyukok nya hmap cquliq haw, (maki qalang ga ini 'byan naha?) Ipun mabi 'byan, blaq talan 'byan naha. Ipun 'byan naha ga 都是日本的muyax, kahul Ipun ga, (ro baq kmayal ke Tayal naha?) ini haw, ini qbaq kmayal haw, (ro mwah lga si kayal ke Ipun ga?) uya, nanu ini su qbaq mung kmayal lga, Tayal ga tmaha tmaha, maha cani ga, "pakayaro, nyan su kmayal nanu! ! ta su lagay tmaha" lma, paq tmucing lga Ipun, nanu mica cyunga ga mnciriq na Ipun ro Tayal uyi ro, maha cani ay, (qalang ta ga nya maki pnciriq uyi ku?) maki ay, ciriq cyunga Tayal ro Ipun uyi ay, us ga Tayal ta ya maga, aki mnciriq qa mpanga laqi musa hlahuy lma ga, musa mgyas hlahuy lma, pgyas kngun hayi Ipun, piyux uyi buki naha uyi ro, ro si kaki hlauy lma ro bsyaq bsyaq laga, blaq sezi na Ipun lma ga, kya mwah mwah muyax la hu, blaq cyunga Ipun uyi, blaq uyi pisa Cyukok qani uyi ga blaq uyi, (mwah Cyukok lga inu naha m'abi? mabi inu naha?) Cyukok ga? (uya) maki mabi 'byan naha(gako uyi ga?) uya m'abi 'byan na Ipun hani ga, blaq sezi na Ipun uyi ay, si ptnaq ga, uka son maha Ipun cyunga ga quriq ro hmaq cquliq, blaq calay Ipun cyunga ay! us ga ini su pung kyalung ga tmucing ga, maha cani, Cyukok kya ini hmut tmucing haw, (yuhum ku sesiy?) ini kyuhum sesiy ya, ini tucing sesiy ya, mlahang laqi qa sesiy, mrkyas ga tmaha su lga, "nanu nyan su tmaha" ma! uwah ma paq paq cingun nya lga, ngungu laro, kusa kya, ziray na cyunga ga moyay calay ay , ini cami qaniq qa ana nanu ay, ana cimu uka uyi, ( maki gako ga maniq cimu nanu? nanu niqun cimu?) naniq cami muyax myan nanaq ro, ini cami qaniq gako ay, uka niqun Tayax ay, (calay ku?) ? kruma siking cami ay, yencong calay Ipun qani irwa ay mqwas, siga lokah psbaq ga, (psbaq cimu nanu?) psbaq su'se ga,siking ga siking pcpung, ( baqun su cyunga maki qutux uron Huanminhua? imi nya ga mrhow Ipun, ro sbaqi cimu mrhow Ipun ma, baqun isu yaw qani ku?) ini cu qbaq ay, mewang kmayal ga qutih uyi haw, ini cu qbaq qaca ya, laqi cami na qaca ro, payat nenci lga, mwah sexu Taywan laro, (baqun su cyan maki qutux mrhow Ipun ku?) ini cu qbaq haw, (pisa hayi mrhow kokak naha), mrhow kokak ga, Ipun ya ga qutux calay mrhow kokak naha ay, ini tosyen ya, qaca alun su mrhow kokak lga, isu kryax alan mrhow kokak, ro wayal su mnuqil mrhow kokak lga, laqi su smiyux la, ana suyan ana kneril nanaq laqi su lga, tyaba lga qaca alan mrhow kokak la, ro magal kneril la, magal klikuy qa alan mrhow kokak laqi na mrhow kokak lga, si ga hopa kaka ga alun naha ga, maha kya Ipun ya, (nanu imi hopa kaka?) siga blaq a'tama naha ga, qaca ga hminas tyaba qalang ca hminas sbaq, ana nanu baqun nya ro, blaq lungan nya ro, qaca mrhow ga, qaca alun naha alan naha alan naha kbayux, maha kya Ipun ya, ini Cyukok ya, payat kawas qutux, senkyo ta ya ga. 對阿, ,(什麼是kaka?) ga, .

== mwani qalang ro cyan te ino 部落概況與位置 == qalang Qba qani hiya ga, mnaki cqa qalang Talah , maki meohong na kkian smi abora na Rongpya,cka na qongo rgyax, binah nya ga rrgyax qabax, betonox calay kkian cani, ski heci akya qotox tmocing moyit toroy. cnlalo qalang Qba qani hiya ga, skahol ke na bnheci cyonga, mosa naha bawiq rgyax mra ro iyik glabang qongo ga rinkyasan nya ga pisan hayi qba, mica qa si naha cnllwan maha qalang Qba. Qba qalang Qba. pinyogan qalang 部落遷徙 pinhqnyan na qalang Qba hiya ga, si ta mbzinas piyox kbhol ckawas, ryax nasa ga baha hmcwa smoya kangi xqayos na kkian ro blaq na rroq qa bnheci, knahol naha theyaq mwah ski kkian mwani, ro maki rryaniq qa pinhqnyan qani ga, molow piyox kihong na yaw qa qalang, ro mica qa nyan mwah cani tnqalang. ryax na klhangan Ipon ga, skahol naha Tkasan ro Tgliq mwah cqani, cqoliq Tkasan mwah lro, cipak na cqoliq mosa loyi hbon Slaq, binah kroma cqoliq mosa Sqboh. ro ringan maki Tgliq na cqoliq ga mosa Kbanon, sta mwah Thelo lga, mica qa mosa loyi Sqboh. 日本時期,自 Tkasan 及 Tgliq 遷入.原 Tkasan hbon Slaq ,其後部分再遷回長嶺.原 Tgliq Sqbwh 地區. tayal qa nyan qalang Qba mwani 人口概況 pisa cqoliq: mwani ga qalang Qba qani hiya ga, akya mposal cqoliq nya, magan calay cinmoyax Tayal nyan maki caca, kroma ga bnheci piyox kawas na yotas yaki, cyan maki kya qalang. mirok: qalang Sqboh hiya ga cqoliq Tayal, qabax cqoliq nya ga glgan naha gaga ro kintayox na Tayal. minanaq na cqoliq: qalang qba qani hiya ga, maki bnheci baq kbly tminon na qeqaya cyonga, naha ga pklahang gaga ro qmoyi gaga. 族群: . qalang Qba hiya ga snhyan naha otox Tayal, ro maki gaga cmyos oyi. snhe naha maha baq maray mblaq na qnxan ro kmloh, mwani ga maki cikay cqoliq mosa Tensinkyo ini ga Kiristo kyokay, maki oyi cqoliq snhe otox Kahat. . qqyanox 經濟與特產 cpiyang yaw tnpila: qalang Qba hiya cpyanga mrwa kblay qeqaya ini ga mqopah, maki oyi cqoliq nyan mawah bbesan, ro pinqomah hiya ga ana ocya,pagay, ro bway qhoniq, kblay na qeqaya hiya ga, ana patas qhoniq, tminon na roma, binah lga wal heci mtiyaw ini ga mqwas la. ,讀書. pinklay: pinklay na qalang ana ocya, minnanaq na tminon ro kblay qeqaya na qhoniq, qabax qeqaya qani ga piyox cqoliq baqon, llwax na qqyanox tnpila na qalang. 特產: . rryaniq 部落交通 qalang Qba hiya ga siglox ryaniq khangi ini ga moyot haya, blaq qa ryaniq cka qalang, mosa tanox ga si glgan baso ini ga haya naha nanaq. mosa so qalang Qba ga, garing so rryaniq 台七甲skora Slamaw, ro si shoyo mosa ski qalang Talah, ini kbsaq lga, trang ptayox so syan abora na Talah oraw lga, skora glax ro tehok so kya qalang Qba oyi la. . wahan mangay mcisan 部落觀光 qalang Qba hiya ga maki piyox than ckaw na wahan cisan ana blaq ktalan na kintalan rgyax ro qalang Tayal. qalang hiya ga pincrox kya qotox ki'an na mkrax qa piyo'an, maki piyox cqoliq mwah cisan cani. . gaga qalang 部落文化 qalang qba hiya ga piyox calay gaga naha, ana ke cyonga, pintasan, ro ryax snqasan, klokah klahang ro qmoyi gaga Tayal qa naha, ro syan naha inlongan qa qabax yaw cyonga, blaq calay kinnxan naha. . cipak kinbaqan na gaga 文化小知識 以下為 Labi Wilang 接受訪問內容: cyonga qnxan myan ga moyay cami ay, oka niqon myan cyonga, maniq cami ngahi, maniq cami ngahi lga,hlaqi lga oka ngahi la, mami trakis nanaq niqon myan la, ro ana cimo ga oka oyi, ro ana qocyo oyi ga ini cami pqocyo cyonga ay, ini kkocyo kakay myan, ini cami plokos oyi, maki lokos ga qabax maki mgaliq nanaq ga, ro nano qaca, maki cami gako ga sesiy myan Ipon, payat cami kawas mnqwas ga, "oy aray lokos, ta nyan mgaliq lokos so ma", oka yaya mo, oka yaba mo, klhangan na yaki mo wayal mnokil yaki mo la son mo, ro sesiy myan Ipon payat nenci ga, ngilis ay! siqan so ma… ro biqan co nya cikay i qotox mongpe ga, 'plokos qani ki'' oya son mo, howay so sesiy son mo, ro payat kawas lga, wayal Ipon la, payat ckawas lga, wayal i Ipon lga ro nyan mwah Cyokok qani la, ro mwah Cyokok q ani lga, bing cami karoh lga, nyan garing mqoci Ipon nyan si kmwa ktiyil laro, 四年級lga wayal Ipon la, ro Cyokok mwah mlahang cami la maha cani, (piyox seto so cyonga ko?) 很多啊, seto cyonga ga khmay ay, os ga Ipon ya ga lokah tmocing ga seto naha, (sesiy baq tocing seto?) ini ini tocing sesiy haw, blaq calay sensey na Ipon ay xmalo, (ro nano cyan naha pqoyo?) Cyonga ga Ipon oyi ga lokah onro lokah ktlyom ga, 還有打棒球 tmocing boro, oka qani ya, 打棒球ro 摔角ca ciriq, ro onrokay maha kya Ipon cyonga ya, qaca ga 很重要, (piyox cqoliq mosa sanka onrokay ko? ) piyox ay! Tayal ga mwah Ipon cyonga ga ini kpiyox ga, mwah mlahang nanaq mwah ga, nano irwa lga alan cami nya pnonro la alan nya pnciriq lro, rayon nya pnciriq qabax seto oyi ga, ro alan nya pcpngan mqwas oyi, ro rayon nya i nano ca la, mosa kmayal i pcpngan kkayal ke maki Girang oyi ga, (heci ga?) heci ga mayal ke na Ipon, ini kayal ke ni Tayal ya, kmayal so ke na Tayal lga, maki qotox tasoki, kmayal so cikay ke Tayal lga, si so nya wahi mato qaca la si so sbaboy laro, mica qa ini cami qbaq ke ni Ipon cyonga ro, (ziray Ipon ko?) oya ga cyonga ga, nano ana cami gbyan mwah moyax masoq cami maniq ga. ini cami k'cyang ay, nayn mwah k'npong cqa na moyax ro mehong moyax, (ima mwah?) laqi ga laqi seto, kmayal so ke na Tayal lga, si so nya biqi qaca la, ro kmayal sesiy ma "ta so kmayal ke na Tayal, ta so ini kayal ke ni Ipon" ini cami qbaq kmayal ciyan ke ni Ipon ro, ro toway mqbaq lga, ro wayal Ipon la, ro Cyokok nyan mlahang laro, ini cami qbaq mong ke ni Cyokok cyonga oyi ay, (son cimo nano baq kmayal la mehong?) bsyaq bsyaq bsyaq lga, maha cani bsyaq lga, baq mong oyi laro, (han ima psbaq cimo?) oka psbaq nyan cami mong ke na sesiy oyi ro sesiy kamyal laro, nano baq baq baq mong lga, nyan cami kmayal ke na Cyonghoaminkok qani lga, maha cani ro.(Cyokok ro Ipon ga qeno blaq?) aya baqaw ta qaca ya ya,(cyonga ga?) cyonga oyi ga ini say maha i Ipon ga mqotiy, blaq qa hnlangan Ipon oyi ay, oka mqoriq nya ga Ipon, blaq calay (blaq calay qnxan qabax) oka qoriq nya, (oka ciriq oyi ko?) oka! ini kmot coliq. kya nanaq Cyokok nya hmap cqoliq haw, (maki qalang ga ini 'byan naha?) Ipon mabi 'byan, blaq talan 'byan naha. Ipon 'byan naha ga 都是日本的moyax, kahol Ipon ga, (ro baq kmayal ke Tayal naha?) ini haw, ini qbaq kmayal haw, (ro mwah lga si kayal ke Ipon ga?) oya, nano ini so qbaq mong kmayal lga, Tayal ga tmaha tmaha, maha cani ga, "pakayaro, nyan so kmayal nano! ! ta so lagay tmaha" lma, paq tmocing lga Ipon, nano mica cyonga ga mnciriq na Ipon ro Tayal oyi ro, maha cani ay, (qalang ta ga nya maki pnciriq oyi ko?) maki ay, ciriq cyonga Tayal ro Ipon oyi ay, os ga Tayal ta ya maga, aki mnciriq qa mpanga laqi mosa hlahoy lma ga, mosa mgyas hlahoy lma, pgyas kngon hayi Ipon, piyox oyi boki naha oyi ro, ro si kaki hlaoy lma ro bsyaq bsyaq laga, blaq sezi na Ipon lma ga, kya mwah mwah moyax la ho, blaq cyonga Ipon oyi, blaq oyi pisa Cyokok qani oyi ga blaq oyi, (mwah Cyokok lga ino naha m'abi? mabi ino naha?) Cyokok ga? (oya) maki mabi 'byan naha(gako oyi ga?) oya m'abi 'byan na Ipon hani ga, blaq sezi na Ipon oyi ay, si ptnaq ga, oka son maha Ipon cyonga ga qoriq ro hmaq cqoliq, blaq calay Ipon cyonga ay! os ga ini so pong kyalong ga tmocing ga, maha cani, Cyokok kya ini hmot tmocing haw, (yohom ko sesiy?) ini kyohom sesiy ya, ini tocing sesiy ya, mlahang laqi qa sesiy, mrkyas ga tmaha so lga, "nano nyan so tmaha" ma! owah ma paq paq cingon nya lga, ngongo laro, kosa kya, ziray na cyonga ga moyay calay ay , ini cami qaniq qa ana nano ay, ana cimo oka oyi, ( maki gako ga maniq cimo nano? nano niqon cimo?) naniq cami moyax myan nanaq ro, ini cami qaniq gako ay, oka niqon Tayax ay, (calay ko?) ? kroma siking cami ay, yencong calay Ipon qani irwa ay mqwas, siga lokah psbaq ga, (psbaq cimo nano?) psbaq so'se ga,siking ga siking pcpong, ( baqon so cyonga maki qotox oron Hoanminhoa? imi nya ga mrhow Ipon, ro sbaqi cimo mrhow Ipon ma, baqon iso yaw qani ko?) ini co qbaq ay, mewang kmayal ga qotih oyi haw, ini co qbaq qaca ya, laqi cami na qaca ro, payat nenci lga, mwah sexo Taywan laro, (baqon so cyan maki qotox mrhow Ipon ko?) ini co qbaq haw, (pisa hayi mrhow kokak naha), mrhow kokak ga, Ipon ya ga qotox calay mrhow kokak naha ay, ini tosyen ya, qaca alon so mrhow kokak lga, iso kryax alan mrhow kokak, ro wayal so mnoqil mrhow kokak lga, laqi so smiyox la, ana soyan ana kneril nanaq laqi so lga, tyaba lga qaca alan mrhow kokak la, ro magal kneril la, magal klikoy qa alan mrhow kokak laqi na mrhow kokak lga, si ga hopa kaka ga alon naha ga, maha kya Ipon ya, (nano imi hopa kaka?) siga blaq a'tama naha ga, qaca ga hminas tyaba qalang ca hminas sbaq, ana nano baqon nya ro, blaq longan nya ro, qaca mrhow ga, qaca alon naha alan naha alan naha kbayox, maha kya Ipon ya, ini Cyokok ya, payat kawas qotox, senkyo ta ya ga. 對阿, ,(什麼是kaka?) ga, .
